name: Relax: The Lake
description:
Take a break from everything and relax on this scenic asian-styled lake pagoda.
Enjoy the clear water and the ever-changing weather.

A walking & watching simulator.

This game is a prototype made when I was stuck fixing a bug in another project and needed a break. Be aware that it has some bugs, and to exit the game use ALT-F4. There are currently no interactables, objectives, or settings. Just enjoy the scenery.

Please remember, this game was made to be as realistic as possible and is set to Ultra Quality. I don't know much about Unity's quality settings, so if it doesn't work on your pc, I probably can't help.

If I make a next version, things I'll try to add include: different quality levels for lower-end pcs, in-game options for changing the game, some interactables and special points-of-interest.
